raw_comment:
I notice that more women visit their parents and video call them than men, but it is still at pretty low percentages for both genders. 
I wonder why women are more likely to contact their parents than men are?
This relates to my community because in todays modern day time the main form of communication is texting, in which we do a lot and is now apart of out daily lives
Communication With My Parents Through A Screen should be the title.
ace_sentences: I notice that more women visit their parents than men.
I notice that more women video-call their parents than men.
The percentages are low for women.
The percentages are low for men.
I wonder why women are more likely to contact their parents than men are.
In modern times, texting is a main form of communication.
People in my community do a lot of texting.
Texting is a part of daily life in my community.
The title should be "Communication With My Parents Through A Screen".
